mapper.insert: insert into collection(article_id, user_id, status, created_at) value (#{articleId}, #{userId}, #{status}, #{createdAt})
mapper.select: select * from collection where user_id = #{userId} and article_id = #{articleId} limit 1

select c.article_id, a.title, au.name, au.dynasty from collection c inner join article a on c.article_id = a.id left join author au on au.id = a.author_id where user_id = #{userId} and status = 1 order by c.id desc limit #{offset}, 10
